At a time when Google is struggling to appear innovative, Page, known for his casual dress, middle class upbringing, and technical nature, still exudes the down-to-earth entrepreneur image. He gives Google back their founder story, which is something that Facebook has, Danny Sullivan noted. Yet others believe it was Eric Schmidt 's decision to step down as CEO, as the executive has developed career aspirations outside of Google.
